alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:01AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Moore and eastern Montgomery Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 901 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Biscoe, or 8 miles east of Troy, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Pinehurst, Biscoe, Robbins, Star, Candor, Taylortown, Seven Lakes and Eagle Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
